21  from __future__ import division 
22  from imusim.testing.quaternions import assertQuaternionAlmostEqual 
23  from imusim.maths.quaternions import QuaternionArray 
24  from imusim.testing.vectors import assert_vectors_correlated 
25  from imusim.utilities.time_series import TimeSeries 
26  import numpy as np 
27   

28 -def checkTrajectory(T, truePositions, trueRotations): 

29      """ 
30      Check the outputs of a trajectory model agree with truth values. 
31   
32      @param T: Trajectory to check. 
33      @param truePositions: L{TimeSeries} of true position values. 
34      @param trueRotations: L{TimeSeries} of true rotation values. 
35      """ 
36   
37      # Get time indices at which position comparisons valid 
38      t = truePositions.timestamps 
39      validity = (t >= T.startTime) & (t <= T.endTime) 
40      t = t[validity] 
41      dt = np.gradient(t) 
42      p = truePositions.values[:,validity] 
43   
44      # Check position 
45      assert_vectors_correlated(T.position(t), p) 
46   
47      # Check velocity 
48      v = np.array(map(np.gradient, p)) / dt 
49      assert_vectors_correlated(T.velocity(t[2:-2]), v[:,2:-2]) 
50   
51      # Check acceleration 
52      a = np.array(map(np.gradient, v)) / dt 
53      assert_vectors_correlated(T.acceleration(t[4:-4]), a[:,4:-4]) 
54   
55      # Get time indices at which rotation comparisons valid 
56      t = trueRotations.timestamps 
57      validity = (t >= T.startTime) & (t <= T.endTime) 
58      t = t[validity] 
59      r = trueRotations.values[validity] 
60   
61      # Check rotation 
62      assertQuaternionAlmostEqual(T.rotation(t), r, tol=0.05) 
63   
64      # Check angular velocity 
65      r, lastR = r[1:], r[:-1] 
66      t, dt = t[1:], np.diff(t) 
67      diffOmega = (2 * (r - lastR) * lastR.conjugate).array.T[1:] / dt 
68      trajOmega = T.rotationalVelocity(t - dt/2) 
69      assert_vectors_correlated(trajOmega[:,2:-2], diffOmega[:,2:-2]) 
70   
71      # Check angular acceleration 
72      diffAlpha = np.array(map(np.gradient, diffOmega)) / dt 
73      trajAlpha = T.rotationalAcceleration(t - dt/2) 
74      assert_vectors_correlated(trajAlpha[:,4:-4], diffAlpha[:,4:-4])
